abstract: Disney is in negotiations to sell off what’s left of Miramax, the art-house studio founded by Harvey and Bob Weinstein.
snippet: Disney is in negotiations to sell off what’s left of Miramax, the art-house studio founded by Harvey and Bob Weinstein.
lead_paragraph: The Walt Disney Company has been quietly shopping what remains of its Miramax film unit and has secured seven to 10 interested bidders, according to a mergers and acquisitions expert with knowledge of the process.

headline.main: Disney Looking to Sell What’s Left of Miramax
